title: 7 Reasons Why Apple Shouldn’t Buy Disney
text:
In Disney CEO Bob Iger’s new book, The Ride of a Lifetime, he makes the comment that his company might have merged with Apple if Steve Jobs were still alive. There is logic in the idea; you may remember that Jobs was once Disney’s largest shareholder, the result of the 2006 Disney acquisition of Pixar.

In a blog post, media analysts Rich Greenfield, Brandon Ross, and Mark Kelley from the new research firm Lightshed Partners engage in a thought experiment: Could the two giant companies still come together and live happily...
description: Media analysts Rich Greenfield, Brandon Ross, and Mark Kelley engage in a thought experiment: Could the two giant companies still come together and live happily ever after?
